feed.title: moving the default display to mbtc

entry.title: moving the default display to mbtc
entry.summary: Jeff Garzik, a Bitcoin core developer and open source evangelist, is associated with BitPay, Inc. which is a payment processing company that enables merchants to accept Bitcoin payments. In 2014, BitPay published an article on their blog in which they discussed the importance of putting the decimal point in the right place while dealing with Bitcoin transactions. The blog post aimed to educate people about the intricacies of handling Bitcoin transactions and avoiding costly mistakes.
